original_text: The people in all the kingdoms around Judah were afraid of the Lord's power. So they did not want to fight a war against Jehoshaphat.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다 사방의 모든 나라에 두려움을 주사 여호사밧과 싸우지 못하게 하시매

sentences.original_text: The people in all the kingdoms around Judah
were afraid of the Lord's power
So they did not want to fight a war
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 전쟁을 싸우고 싶지 않았습니다
